fields.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Numeric value for Pattern Week Number for Pattern Schedule Event.
Day(s) of the Week for Pattern Schedule Event.
Minute-precision Start Time for Pattern Schedule Event. Note: This is also referred to as the In time for the schedule pattern.
Minute-precision End Time for Pattern Schedule Event. Note: This is also referred to as the Out time for the schedule pattern.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Boolean value specifying whether the Pattern Schedule Event is a 24-Hour Shift.
Wrapper element containing meal times for the Work Schedule Calendar Event.

Day_of_the_Week_Reference.description: Day(s) of the Week for Pattern Schedule Event.

End_Time.description: Minute-precision End Time for Pattern Schedule Event. Note: This is also referred to as the Out time for the schedule pattern.

Meal_Data.description: Wrapper element containing meal times for the Work Schedule Calendar Event.

Shift_Profile_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Start_Time.description: Minute-precision Start Time for Pattern Schedule Event. Note: This is also referred to as the In time for the schedule pattern.

Week_Number.description: Numeric value for Pattern Week Number for Pattern Schedule Event.

WorkScheduleCalendar_Work_Schedule_Calen.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

_24_Hour_Shift.description: Boolean value specifying whether the Pattern Schedule Event is a 24-Hour Shift.
